text.text: Hello <google.com|@JulioMendez>! Welcome to Operation Code! I'm a bot designed to help you navigate this Slack workspace. Our goal here at Operation Code is to get veterans and their families started on the path to a career in tech. We do that through providing you with scholarships, mentoring, career development opportunities, conference tickets, and more! You can check out more information about us <https://operationcode.org/about|here>.
Much of the provided aid requires veteran or military spouse status. Please verify your status on your profile at https://operationcode.org if you haven't already.

You are currently in Slack, a chat application that serves as the hub of Operation Code. If you are visiting us via your browser, Slack provides a <https://slack.com/downloads/|stand alone program> to make staying in touch even more convenient.

All active Operation Code open source projects are located on our <https://github.com/OperationCode|source control repository located on Github>. Lastly, please take a moment to review our <https://github.com/OperationCode/community/blob/master/code_of_conduct.md|Code of Conduct>.
